entry.title: Clic - Multicolor Chickpeas - 100 oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Unico
Type: FOOD
Price: 8.99

Look no further than these canned multicolor chick peas for a versatile ingredient your customers are sure to love..!

Chick peas have a softer texture and a hearty flavor that can spice up many different meals on your patrons' plates. With no cholesterol and 0 grams of sugar, these protein rich chick peas offer a low calorie option for the health conscious consumer. Toss some on top of leafy lettuce with a drizzle of dressing for a cold and refreshing salad, roast them for a crispy side dish, or grind them to a thick dip mixed with herbs and spices for a one-of-a kind hummus and enjoy!

Canned with only water and salt, these chick peas are packed with fresh flavor and homegrown taste. Before the canning process, each batch of chick peas is cared for and nurtured to ensure incomparable quality. These freshly cut chick peas then soak in their savory juice that the canning process helps to preserve, giving you natural chickpea flavor and texture that enhances vegetarian, Indian, and Mediterranean fare, and more!

entry.title: Heinz - Original Beans In Tomato Sauce - 398 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Heinz
Type: FOOD
Price: 2.69

Heinz - Original Beans In Tomato Sauce - 398 ml

  • 398 ml cans of Heinz Original Beans in Tomato Sauce
  • Use as a base for preparing hearty soups; add to toppings for omelets, hot dogs, and hamburgers
  • Empty contents of can into heating utensil, cover & heat slowly
  • Heinz Original Beans in Tomato Sauce have a familiar home cooked taste and traditional flavour that complements any meal. Made with No Preservatives, Heinz Original Beans in Tomato Sauce are a high source of fibre, good source of iron and a source of calcium.

entry.title: Cedar - Red Kidney Beans - 540 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: FOOD
Price: 2.29

Canned Red Kidney Beans, Easy To Use, Perfect for great recipes!

Whip up an effortlessly delicious dish with these red kidney beans! Rich in color, firm in texture, and featuring a classic bean shape, these kidney beans are great for incorporating in a variety of dishes. Not only that, but it's easy to include these beans into your menu-they save valuable time cooking dried beans in the kitchen! Canned to maintain optimal texture and freshness, these beans are ready to heat and serve.

Great for any recipe..! 

They increase the productivity and efficiency of your service. These dark red kidney beans maintain their savory, hearty flavor that's sure to please your guests! The perfect addition to soups, stews, salads and more, dark red kidney beans are an excellent source of protein. Toss them in a cold salad, or add them to chili con carne. Offer your guests to a classic Creole dish of red beans and rice to give your guests a southern treat! Great served hearty beef chilis, Tex-Mex fare, and more-the possibilities are endless!

entry.title: La Costena - Refried Black Beans - 546 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: La Costena
Type: FOOD
Price: 3.99

La Costena - Refried Black Beans - 546 ml

La Costena refried black beans, 546 mL Add a taste of Mexico to all your meals with delicious, ready-to-serve refried beans. La Costena beans are one of Mexico's favourites and can be used to prepare a lot of different dishes or used as a side-dish to perfectly complement and add flavour anytime.

Price: 2.99

La Costena - Whole Black Beans - 528 ml

La Costeña whole black beans, 528g are rich and traditional. They are prepared with 100% natural ingredients and no preservatives like onion, tomato, jalapeño pepper, salt and spices. Prepare a bean broth with them and accompany all your meals.

entry.title: Unico - Romano Beans - 540 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Unico
Type: FOOD
Price: 2.79

Unico - Romano Beans - 540 ml

Versatile, fresh, and packed with flavor, these  beans bring popular and satisfying meals to the table that your customers are sure to love! Each can contains deliciously-crisp, richly-colored beans that are perfect for enhancing salad bars and catering menus. 

Romano beans are dense and meaty, and hold their shape well during cooking. These beans are packaged in a salt solution that helps the beans retain their distinctive taste and texture, ensuring that you get the best product possible. They may be served on their own with rice, or they can enhance profitable Mexican-style menu items like taco salads and burritos. Great for cooking, these beans can also be blended into soups.
